snippet: The United Nations World Food Program will send corn to the country, where thousands have been displaced and large areas of farmland washed away.
abstract: United Nations World Food Program says it will send a first batch of emergency food aid to impoverished North Korea, where a typhoon and floods have left hundreds of people dead or missing.
lead_paragraph: The United Nations World Food Program will send corn to the country, where thousands have been displaced and large areas of farmland washed away.

headline.seo: Emergency Food Aid for North Korea After Severe Floods
headline.main: North Korea to Receive Aid After Floods
headline.print_headline: North Korea To Receive Aid After Floods
